mapper.insert: INSERT INTO 貸出(貸出ID, 会員番号, 蔵書コード, 貸出日) VALUES (#{bookOnLoanId}, #{memberNumber.value}, #{bookCollectionCode.value}, #{loanDate.value.value})
mapper.select: SELECT 会員の貸出.会員番号 as "memberNumber.value", 会員の貸出.蔵書コード as "bookCollectionCode.value", 会員の貸出.貸出日 as "loanDate.value.value" FROM ( SELECT 貸出ID, 会員番号, 蔵書コード, 貸出日 FROM 貸出 WHERE 貸出.会員番号 = #{memberNumber.value} ) as 会員の貸出 LEFT OUTER JOIN 返却 ON (会員の貸出.貸出ID = 返却.貸出ID AND 返却.貸出ID = null)
